newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks jump towards end on short-covering.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks jump towards end on short-covering.

text.p: Pakistani stocks jumped near Thursday's close on short-covering in blue chips ahead of the Friday-Saturday weekend, but dealers said the index would slip back soon on weak market fundamentals.
The Karachi 100-share index rose 9.91 points, or 0.73 percent, to end at 1,363.50. Losers led gainers 144 to 88.

"There was panic short-covering in oversold blue chips like PTCL and Hub Power," dealer Usman Ashraf said. "Uncertainty looms large on the political and economic fronts and people squared their positions ahead of the weekend." Hub Power rose 0.95 rupees to 30.15. -- Amir Zia 9221-5685192
